description: Coachly transcription service - Production Ready with Complete Bug Fixes
releaseNotes:
- ✅ All critical bugs resolved - system now production ready
 - ✅ Complete frontend-backend integration with real API calls
 - ✅ Fixed Google STT v2 compatibility issues and language codes
 - ✅ Resolved upload workflow issues (MP4 support, M4A removal)
 - ✅ Fixed progress bar visual glitches and precision rounding
 - ✅ Improved real-time polling with memory leak fixes
 - ✅ Enhanced database transaction handling and rollback mechanisms
 - ✅ End-to-end audio transcription workflow fully functional
author: Coachly Team
